parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

propertyId.description: The identifier of the product condition

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

masterArrangementId.description: The unique identifier to specify an arrangement reference which is act as a Master for the arrangement being created.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

alternateId.description: An Alternate Identification for the Deal. This can be used to retrieve the Deal for amendment.

accountType.description: Groups the products based on their type, eg, Checking, Savings, CD etc,.

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

anniversary.description: The start or end period defined in MMDD format to indicate the period when charge rules has to be applied

alternateId.description: An Alternate Identification for the Deal. This can be used to retrieve the Deal for amendment.

accountType.description: Groups the products based on their type, eg, Checking, Savings, CD etc,.

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

anniversary.description: The start or end period defined in MMDD format to indicate the period when charge rules has to be applied

customer.description: Contains the customer identifier to fetch list of consent arrangements for the customer or customer identifier of the debtor account. This will be populated once the SCA(Strong Customer Authentication) is completed.

customerRole.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

taxLiabilityPercentage.description: Tax liability percentage of the customer

limitAllocactionPercentage.description: Indicates percentage of limit allocated to the customer out of overall limit

GLAllocactionPercentage.description: Indicates GL allocation percentage of the customer

jointLiability.description: Identifies if there is a joint liability on the limit record Allowed values: -YES -NO

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

paymentMethod.description: Method chosen to make the payment

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency at which a payment is required to be generated

billType.description: The type of payment obligation generated

autoSettle.description: Indicates if the settlement is automatic at the Customer / Broker side

propertyId.description: The identifier of the product condition

dueFrequency.description: Defines the frequency date when a payment  has to be made due. When not mentioned, this will be same as the paymentFrequency

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

amortisationTerm.description: Indicates the amortisation term. When specified, the repayment amount is calculated based on the amortisation term insteam of the account term. When the amortisation term is less than account term, there will be a residual amount to be paid at the maturity.

residualAmount.description: The amount to be paid at the maturity date

payinSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payin Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payout Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

payoutBeneficiary.description: The beneficiary that payment should be made to .

payinSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payin Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payout Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

payoutBeneficiary.description: The beneficiary that payment should be made to .

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

defaultSettlementAccount.description: Default settlement account to be used for all incoming payments and outgoing settlements when a specific settlement account is not provided for each payment type.

consentTypes.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

consentType.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

accountIBANs.description: Indicates the consent type provided for a particular account. For example, If consent sub type for account 100100 is given as allPsd2, the account is given global consent.

accountIBAN.description: Represents the International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the account.  E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

isConsentGiven.description: Indicates whether the consent is given for a specific type. Allowed values:  - YES,NO

accountBlock.description: Indicates whether the consent account has been blocked or not. Holds YES/NO/Blank.

blockFrom.description: Specifies the date on which account consent is blocked.

blockTill.description: Specifies until which date account consent to be blocked.

blockNotes.description: Indicates the reason for which the consent is blocked.

consentSubType.description: Indicates the consent sub type linked to corresponding consent type.

consentStatuses.description: Status of the consent. This can be of received, valid, expired, terminatedByTpp or revokedByPsu.

consentStatus.description: Status of the consent. This can be of received, valid, expired, terminatedByTpp or revokedByPsu.

lastActionDate.description: Indicates the date on which the status of the consent arrangement changed.

thirdpartyproviderId.description: Unique TPP(third party provider) reference which is the global urn of the TPP. For example: PSDLU-CSSF-9db9074bf3be45550237a21cd2a11585

signUpService.description: Indicates whether the signing up information is to be AISP(Accounts information service provider) or PISP(Payments information service provider).

recurringIndicator.description: Indicates whether the expiry date to be recalculated for every duration of expiry period.

frequencyPerDay.description: Specifies the frequency in which the payment application executes the payment instruction

combinedServiceIndicator.description: Specifies whether the payment initiation service will be addressed in the same session as account information consent request

scaStatus.description: Contains the status of the strong customer authentication process for the payment or consent. Valid values are received, psuIdentified, scaMethodSelected, started, finalised or failed

link.description: Contains the arrangement activity reference of the parent. This is used during secondary activity processing where child activities are generated at runtime during processing.

thirdpartyprovider.description: Contains the TPP (third party provider) name or text of the TPP reference

externalUserId.description: Contains the external user identifier for which the consent is created.

onlineArrangement.description: Contains the arrangement identifier of the external user that contains the rights that the external user has access to.

propertyValue.description: Specifies the property value for the input key

code.description: The identifier of the error message

changeAmount.description: Indicates the amount by which the original commitment amount increased or decreased.

term.description: Indicates the term for which the contract is booked

revolving.description: Indicates if commitment is revolving or non revolving in nature

updateLimit.description: Flag to define if the limits are to be booked or not at the time of issuing the pre-advice LC. Allowed values: - YES - NO (same as null) - null (default).

consentTypes.description: Conset Type for which the consent is given.The pre-defined consent types are set at Product level and will default on to the arrangement.

consentType.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

consentGiven.description: Identifies whether the consent has been given to the customer to perform the transaction

consentGivenDate.description: Indicates the date on which the consent was given by a customer for a specific consent type.

consentWithdraw.description: Identifies whether the consent has been withdrawn to the customer to perform the transaction

consentSubType.description: Indicates the consent sub type linked to corresponding consent type.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

nextPaymentAmount.description: Indicates the payment amount to be settled in the next schedule

nextPaymentDate.description: Indicates next payment date for the contract

sortCode.description: Contains bank sort code or iban branch identifier for the account

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

clientName.description: Identifies the name of the client.

cardType.description: The type of the card, e.g. Visa, Mastercard, etc.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

availableAmount.description: The credit limit available to the customer for use

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

openingBalance.description: Balance brought forward from the previous date/period.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

aaaId.description: The Identifier of the aa record created

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

propertyId.description: The identifier of the product condition

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

masterArrangementId.description: The unique identifier to specify an arrangement reference which is act as a Master for the arrangement being created.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

activityId.description: Id of the activity, e.g. ACCOUNTS-CAPITALISE-ACCHARGE*CARDISSUEFEE

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

activity.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. parseTime.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

payinSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payin Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payout Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

payoutBeneficiary.description: The beneficiary that payment should be made to .

payinSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payin Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutSettlement.description: Flag to indicate whether Payout Settlement instruction is required or not.Valid input is Yes or No.Default value is Yes.

payoutAccount.description: The account to which a settlement amount is transferred.

payoutBeneficiary.description: The beneficiary that payment should be made to .

paymentType.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

defaultSettlementAccount.description: Default settlement account to be used for all incoming payments and outgoing settlements when a specific settlement account is not provided for each payment type.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

parseTime.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

consentTypes.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

consentType.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

accountIBANs.description: Indicates the consent type provided for a particular account. For example, If consent sub type for account 100100 is given as allPsd2, the account is given global consent.

accountIBAN.description: Represents the International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the account.  E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

isConsentGiven.description: Indicates whether the consent is given for a specific type. Allowed values:  - YES,NO

accountBlock.description: Indicates whether the consent account has been blocked or not. Holds YES/NO/Blank.

blockFrom.description: Specifies the date on which account consent is blocked.

blockTill.description: Specifies until which date account consent to be blocked.

blockNotes.description: Indicates the reason for which the consent is blocked.

consentSubType.description: Indicates the consent sub type linked to corresponding consent type.

consentStatuses.description: Status of the consent. This can be of received, valid, expired, terminatedByTpp or revokedByPsu.

consentStatus.description: Status of the consent. This can be of received, valid, expired, terminatedByTpp or revokedByPsu.

lastActionDate.description: Indicates the date on which the status of the consent arrangement changed.

thirdpartyproviderId.description: Unique TPP(third party provider) reference which is the global urn of the TPP. For example: PSDLU-CSSF-9db9074bf3be45550237a21cd2a11585

signUpService.description: Indicates whether the signing up information is to be AISP(Accounts information service provider) or PISP(Payments information service provider).

recurringIndicator.description: Indicates whether the expiry date to be recalculated for every duration of expiry period.

frequencyPerDay.description: Specifies the frequency in which the payment application executes the payment instruction

combinedServiceIndicator.description: Specifies whether the payment initiation service will be addressed in the same session as account information consent request

scaStatus.description: Contains the status of the strong customer authentication process for the payment or consent. Valid values are received, psuIdentified, scaMethodSelected, started, finalised or failed

link.description: Contains the arrangement activity reference of the parent. This is used during secondary activity processing where child activities are generated at runtime during processing.

thirdpartyprovider.description: Contains the TPP (third party provider) name or text of the TPP reference

externalUserId.description: Contains the external user identifier for which the consent is created.

onlineArrangement.description: Contains the arrangement identifier of the external user that contains the rights that the external user has access to.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

consentGiven.description: Identifies whether the consent has been given to the customer to perform the transaction

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

parseTime.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

nextPaymentAmount.description: Indicates the payment amount to be settled in the next schedule

nextPaymentDate.description: Indicates next payment date for the contract

sortCode.description: Contains bank sort code or iban branch identifier for the account

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

clientName.description: Identifies the name of the client.

cardType.description: The type of the card, e.g. Visa, Mastercard, etc.

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

availableAmount.description: The credit limit available to the customer for use

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

openingBalance.description: Balance brought forward from the previous date/period.

code.description: The identifier of the error message
